Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, I made you some instant pancakes. Enjoy. [211]$h#$e#What? I never learned to cook... mum always did that.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: The only thing I miss about living at home is Mum's fish casserole
Entries.OneKid_0: I'll change %kid1's nappy... don't worry about it. You've got enough on your plate.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their nappies! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.$h#$e#I'm just kidding... I didn't marry you for the money.
Entries.Good_1: Do you ever think of that night we sneaked into my room? I do, often...$l
Entries.summer_27: Summer's great, but I'm ready for the autumn now.#$e#Should we watch the jellyfish tomorrow night? It's always kind of fun.
Entries.fall_1: It seems like the whole valley's changed overnight... I guess autumn's finally here.
Entries.fall_26: I wonder if Mum will let Vincent enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not...$h#$e#Poor kid. He's gonna have to grow up some day...
